document_data.name: Wormblod
document_data.mainbody: '''Wormblod''' was the chieftain of the [[Great Worm Tribe]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], Wormblod led a group of his [[berserker]]s, an enslaved [[white dragon]], and a shaman to try to break inside the [[Eye of the All-Father]] temple with the objective of find a missing member of the tribe, [[Noori]]. In truth, Wormblod only wanted the treasures inside.
document_data.Activities: Wormblod only occasionally led his warriors to defend their territory. However, every time he acted he wanted war and treasure.
